Entries.DialogueText: Oh! It's a... well, it's something. I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today.
Oh! Thank you very much! I didn't expect anyone to know it was my birthday today.
For me? What a gift! This looks fantastic!
You know, on a physiological level, I wouldn't advise the consumption of alcohol...
But there's no denying the benefit of kicking back and enjoying a glass of fine Stardew Valley wine!
It's for me? Thank you! This will be fantastic drizzled on some pasta.
You're giving me this? I'm honored. Thank you!
*gulp*... I... I think I'm going to be sick...
I've never felt like this before...
I've been thinking about you so much, I can hardly do my work.
Maru's been unusually cheerful lately... I hear you may have something to do with that.
I... I can't look at you. Please spare me any more pain.
I'm busy with my work. I can't speak to you.
Thanks, . I appreciate that.
*Sigh*... rude.
Thanks, .
You see, George, I'm just trying to help you.
*Sigh*
Look, George. If you want to behave like this I'm going to have to tell your wife. I don't think she'll be happy.
...You're right.
...Thanks.
Oh! Hospitals make you nervous, huh?
Just try and relax. I'm here to help.
Okay. That makes sense.
Um. Okay... If you say so.
As a small town doctor, you can't help but form a personal connection with your patients. That can be both good and bad...
I've been working on an 'animal checklist' for a few years now. I want to observe every species living in the valley!
I tried making my own pickles one time...
Um, let me put it this way... The frogs we dissected in high school smelled like roses in comparison...
I've never told anyone about my airplane hobby before... I guess I just feel comfortable talking to you.
As a doctor, you can only do so much to help your patients...
I've made the mistake of getting too emotionally involved in the past... I won't let that happen again...
I don't know why I was ashamed about being in dance aerobics class. My legs have become so strong, I should feel as bold as a lion!
Well now that you know my secret, I might as well give you an update... I was significantly less winded after aerobics class this week!
I got such a good workout during aerobics class, I think I can treat myself to some pasta primavera tonight...
Have you been going into the mines, ?
It's a dangerous place. I recommend against it.
When you eat certain foods you'll perform better.
Eating a 'Farmer's Lunch' will give you the nutrition you need to water and harvest crops better!
Oh! You... want to dance with me?
...Yes. I'd love to!
I've been looking forward to it all afternoon! You look radiant in the fresh spring air, my love.
Oh! I'm sorry... I, er... have plans to ask someone else.
It's a beautiful day, isn't it?
I wish I had less work to do.
Stop by my place if you ever need a confidential check-up.
If you want to hang out in my apartment, that's okay with me. I live above the clinic.
I brought some medical supplies, just in case. Be careful out there!
The first time this happened, we were all worried that the rain might be dangerous.
But what if it's actually healthy for the body? Who knows... The plants seem to respond well to it, at least.
It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm Harvey, the local doctor.
I perform regular check-ups and medical procedures for all the residents of Pelican Town. It's rewarding work.
I hope you'll find your own work equally rewarding, in time.
This is the happiest moment of my life...
Congratulations on your marriage, . Maru's already informed me that she'll continue to work at the clinic, which is a relief!
We sell a few over-the-counter medicines at the clinic... feel free to stop by if you're feeling exhausted.
I know that being a farmer is pretty tiring work... don't overdo it!
Oh! Hi, .
Do you... have any medical questions?
I feel responsible for the health of this whole community... it's kind of stressful.
It's a pretty small community, and I'm fortunate to be able to build a good relationship with my patients.
I'd like to stay in Stardew Valley for a while. I'm finally starting to feel involved in the community.
It feels good to know that you're useful.
I'll let you in on a little secret... I can only swim with floaties.
It's important to stay hydrated in this heat. I'm going to ask Gus if he has any coconut water!
It's nice to have an opportunity to relax now and then.
The trouble is actually letting go of your worries...
Sunscreen? Check...
Sun hat? Check...
If you get burnt, a little aloe vera cream might help soothe the skin.
I combed the whole beach for glass. We wouldn't want anyone to get a cut on their foot!
Can I do anything for you?
Take care.
*Sigh*... I'm starting to feel kind of old...
The older you get the more memories you're burdened with. It can be overwhelming.
I think I'll stay younger with you around.
I came here because I liked the small-town atmosphere, and the potential for a holistic approach to patient care.
I've grown to really love it.
I want you back in my life, . I'm willing to forget what happened.
People don't get sick much during the summer. That's nice, but it also means less business for me.
It's okay to get a moderate amount of sunlight. Just don't get burnt.
Okay. Take care! Stay healthy.
Exercise is important, but don't get too exhausted, or you might end up at my clinic!
Make sure and listen to your body.
Hmm... I'm struggling to make ends meet. I don't have enough patients.
I guess I should try to get patients from the neighboring towns...
Imagine having a patient's life completely in your hands, and failing to keep them alive... that's something that will haunt you forever.
Nutrition is important, so make sure and eat well. Try to increase your vegetable intake!
Home-cooked meals are best. Do you cook?
As a doctor, I'm well aware of the benefits of home-cooked food. But I'm so busy, I have a hard time bringing myself to cook.|It's a lot of work, being a doctor. I don't eat as well as I should.
If I didn't live alone I think it would be easier.
Feel free to stop by my office if you're ever feeling ill.
You're young, though. You'll probably stay healthy without trying.
Don't overwork yourself, . Doctor's orders!
If our farmers get sick, where will we get our food? We need you!|Don't overwork yourself, . Doctor's orders!
Your health is important to me.
Remember to cover your mouth when you sneeze.
Then make sure to wash your hands.
I'd like to get to know you better, . Let's put aside our doctor-patient relationship.
It's nice to have a friend in town.
You have a really healthy glow. That's good.
I hate to say this, but I do make a lot more money during flu season.
I guess if people stopped getting sick, I'd be out of business.
Don't get the wrong idea! I want people to be healthy... really!
It's flu season, so you'd better be extra careful.
Make sure to wash your hands often.
Oh my goodness! I have so much to prepare before the wedding! I'm nervous.
I'll be relieved after we're all settled in on your farm.
I'm really happy.
This was always my secret wish.
Ah... You're right on time, !
Let me just set the table...
You've been working so hard on the farm... I wanted to make you a special dinner.
It's my very own 'angel hair pasta primavera'... with clams!
So, tell me about your day...
Whew... I'm stuffed! That was great...
I'll take care of the dishes...
Don't feel bad... I like to do nice things for you! It makes me happy.
I know I say this a lot, but... marrying you was the best thing that ever happened to me!
Needs salt...
It's burning!
Hmm...
A little bit of this...
Some of this...
Presto!
Heavenly, huh? That must be the 'angel hair'!
I'm glad you like it! You deserve the best.
Oh yes, I forgot to mention... it's 'whole wheat' pasta. And it's brimming with fresh vegetables.
It's important that you eat healthy food! I want you to live forever...
That makes sense. There's lots to do in this valley! ...And I know how hard you work.
Just remember to take breaks! When you're so busy, it's easy to get burnt out from exhaustion.
Ah... I have that problem, too. The boundary between days can blur together... it's hard to keep track of everything!
Took the day off, huh? I'm glad to hear it.
Well, with a day off and a hearty dinner you'll be fully re-charged for tomorrow.
That was filling. I'm gonna sleep well...
Oh... I see. I knew I needed to add more salt.
Well, at least you'll be well hydrated.
Oh... I thought I gave myself the burnt one.
Um, I lost track of one the pans and it caught fire... Sorry, dear.
Uhhh...! Heh. I guess a piece of my moustache may have fallen into the pasta...
Well! Extra fiber, right? Heh... (sorry honey)
Oh! Eh... Must've been the truffle oil I drizzled on top...
You meant delicious, edible fungus... right honey? Of course... Heh.
Yes, I can still see the dirt in your hair! I really appreciate all the hard work you do, honey.
That sounds dangerous... are you sure that's safe?
I don't want to see you on the operating table anytime soon...
Although I have to say, I like how courageous you are...
A peaceful day by the water, huh? That sounds very relaxing.
I'm glad you're having fun out there!
Ah, that's good. Having an active social life is healthy for the brain.
But remember, I'm always here for you if you need someone to talk to!
...I've pumped his stomach and re-hydrated his body. He's going to be okay.
It's good that you brought him in, though.
Too much alcohol is terrible for the body... but right now I'm most worried about his mental health...
When he comes to, I'll have a chat with him about his treatment options. I know an excellent counselor in Zuzu City...
Life can be painful, sometimes...
But there's always hope for a better future. You've got to believe in that.
Sorry I'm all disheveled... I didn't know you were coming over.
Hey, I think I hear a plane overhead...
, get over here!
Look!
As a kid, my dream was always to be a pilot.
...But with my bad eyesight and a crippling fear of heights, that dream started to fade away.
It's okay... don't be sad.
I've grown to accept my station in life. Not everyone can achieve their dreams... that's just the way the world is.
Hey, let me show you my model airplanes. I just finished the new TR-Starbird deluxe set.
Ah, ! I was just about to write you a letter.
You see, my records indicate that you're due for your annual checkup!
Now, now... There's no need to worry. It'll be quick and painless. Please follow me.
Hmm... Okay. Hold still, please.
Say 'ahhh...'
Okay, you can stop.
I just need to check your vitals.
86 null 86 20 event_heart1 86 20 event_heart2 86 -50 event_heart3#Are you really a doctor? My pulse is fine!
Well, then! You seem very healthy, .
Just make sure not to overwork yourself on that farm!
Thanks for stopping in.
Hello? Hello? Is anyone out there?
This is Dr. H at... 52 North 43.5 East... Seeking aerial response...Anyone out there?
Someone's there!?
Er... I mean!... Standard ground report: Wind at 3 Clicks, 36 Degrees North of West. Ground Temperature at 42 Kraggs. Humidity 53%. Dr. H out!
Yikes, my pulse is soaring...
Ah, well... You see, I was just on my radio here... and I made contact with a real pilot!
As a matter of fact, we can probably see him flying overhead right now!
Quick, get over here!
Copy.. Dr. H on the ground... this is Blackbird Fiver Fiver Zuzu. Anything to report?
Pretend like everything's normal.
What happened? I heard something break.
You shouldn't blame others for your own problems, Maru.
*sigh*... I'll have to call the patient back in to recollect this sample.
This'll probably put us in the red for another month...
Someone found you unconscious and battered... I had to perform an emergency surgery on you!
Be a little more careful next time, okay?
Thanks for telling me the truth, Maru.
Don't worry about the sample, we'll just get another one.
Of course... you've been a big help around here. I don't know what I'd do without you!
? You look a little pale... are you feeling okay?
Okay, George. I want you take a deep breath for me.
Mmhmm... turn around, please.
George, I'll be honest with you. You need to make some changes in your lifestyle if you want to stay healthy.
I'd like you to reduce your sodium intake, and try to get some moderate exercise with your arms.
I'm your doctor, George. That's who I am...
And I went to school for 8 years so I could learn how to help people stay healthy.
Oh!
I'm sorry, but you shouldn't be here... these check-ups are supposed to be private.
Very well...
84 null 84 40 event_george1 friend_George_-20 84 40 event_george1 friend_George_-20#George knows what's best for his own body.
84#Thanks for your help, . I appreciate it.|It's better not to give my patients mixed messages, . Please remember that in the future.
There you are... just in time!
Look, here it comes!
Oh dear... our time's almost up.
Um... ? We've known each other for a while now and... I... er...
Whoops... Our time was up half an hour ago. We'd better touch down.
I saw an ad in the paper for these balloon rides and I knew I had to surprise you with one.
Okay... you first.
We... We're up so high... *gulp*
I wanted to impress you with this... but look at me. I'm a trembling coward.
Well, you've got more than enough courage to make up for me, ... that's... that's part of why I like you.
Okay, I'm going to open my eyes and look down... don't let go of my hand.
I... I think I can do it now.
Hey, this is incredible! I think I can see Mayor Lewis standing in the town square!
Marcello's Balloon Rentals at your service!
Marcello: It's all yours for two hours.
Marcello: Now... I was told there's a saloon somewhere around here?
...But aren't you afraid of heights?
I haven't had such a wonderful day for as long as I can remember.
I am... yeah.
But I'm determined to not let that stop me from doing what I want... and experiencing this with you.
I'll try not to get scared.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099
Entries.DialogueText: You tricked all of us into thinking we loved you...

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1
Entries.DialogueText: ... I thought you wanted to get married and start a family with me... What did I do wrong?

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195013/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/k 195099_1
Entries.DialogueText: ...yes.

Entries.DialogueFrom: Event:Saloon/195099/f Shane 2500/f Sebastian 2500/f Sam 2500/f Harvey 2500/f Alex 2500/f Elliott 2500/o Abigail/o Penny/o Leah/o Emily/o Maru/o Haley/o Shane/o Harvey/o Sebastian/o Sam/o Elliott/o Alex/e 911526/e 528052/e 9581348/e 43/e 384882/e 233104/i 446/k 195013
Entries.DialogueText: You showed up just in time for the first ever Pelican Town 8-ball tournament!
That's not going to work! You won't be preying on our sympathies this time!
*pant*...*pant*...Yes.
! You were watching me?
...How embarrassing... I didn't want anyone to know. Least of all you.
I'm just trying to stay healthy. As you get older, it requires more effort.
I'm not in very good shape, though... I can hardly keep up with them.
-1 null -1 20 event_aerobics1 -1 -50 event_aerobics2#I can't promise that.
Wow, that was quite a workout...
When I'm next to you, I'm not even scared of falling off this cliff and dashing onto the sharp rocks below..."/jump Harvey/shake Harvey 1000/pause 1000/speak Harvey "...
I... I love and admire you very much, ..."
I'll wait here until you're ready to go home...
And just a few steps over there, Gus is grilling up a batch of pork ribs... Yikes.I've got some soul-searching to do...
Hi, honey. Good luck today in the competition. I just know you're going to shine!
I'm astonished by the level of craftsmanship on display here. Some people are so talented!
Hi... I was hoping you'd find me here...
Oh! You found me...The truth is, I got too scared so I came here to hide. Don't tell anyone.
I was wondering when I'd see you.Don't mind me. I'm just taking a quick breather.
I'm afraid to say I'm quite puzzled on this one...
How is everyone doing? I'm just taking a break for a little while. I'm looking forward to seeing you in the egg hunt!
Eggs definitely have a place in the well-balanced diet.Oops... I should take off my Doctor's hat for the time being.
Eggs are fine, but I'd advise against eating thirty per day!
I'm working up the courage to ask someone to dance with me.
I wore my best tie for the occasion.
If you spend some time pondering the hardships of life, it can put things into perspective.Suddenly, dancing in front of the whole town in an ill-fitting suit doesn't seem so bad!
Oh dear... I've got sand in my socks...
Good thing I came with sunscreen.I wonder if Maru could use some sunscreen on her shoulders?
This music is making my legs move on their own... just like aerobics class!
*pant*... *pant*... ahhhh, I can't wait for a bowl of piping hot soup...
Well, summer's over. To be honest, I'll be happy to say goodbye to these blasted mosquitos!
Hi, honey. It'll be any moment now when the jellies show up... It never gets old!
With each passing second, my anticipation grows...
I'm feeling a little overwhelmed... thank goodness for this crisp air...
I'm thankful there were no medical emergencies this year!
There's a lot I'm thankful for, like my clinic, the good health of my patients...But ultimately, I'm most thankful for the life we're building together...
Have you tried the pecan pie? It's my favorite.
I'm dreaming of our warm fire back home...
Extreme temperatures can put your body under a lot of stress, so make sure to bundle up!Oh, and enjoy the festival!
Hi, honey. Good luck today in the ice fishing contest.
I shouldn't have waxed my moustache this morning, it's frozen solid! Oh dear...Well, if you need an ice pick, you know where to find me...
It's for me? This is my favorite stuff! It's like you read my mind.
That's such a nice gift. Thank you!
Hmm... Are you sure this is healthy?
...I think I'm allergic to this.
Thanks. That's very kind of you.
